name: Lalli and Kiisu
description:
Lalli and Kiisu are the only two members of their own private detective club. This time they've found themselves at the door of Lalli's grandmother's attic and are about to find out what secrets grandma left behind.

Made for Global Game Jam 2021 in 48 hours.

Credits: dosto, henrimikael, Muura Karu, Riuku.
